item.title: Style your site colors
item.description: You can totally customize your site’s theme colors within minutes of creating a new site. Read on to find out how, and decide which of the three options meets your needs. Use a color theme Hugo Apéro includes 8 built-in color themes that work “out of the box.” This means you can use a color theme to quickly customize the look of your site without needing to write any CSS.

item.title: Style your site typography
item.description: As with color themes, you can completely customize your site’s fonts within minutes of creating a new site. How you do it depends on how much control and customization you need. Embedded fonts Hugo Apéro includes 6 embedded fonts that work “out of the box.” We selected 3 serif and 3 sans-serif options that we thought looked good with this theme, in our humble opinions. All embedded fonts include real italics so you may emphasize to your heart’s content ❤️!
